explains: n. 审查，检查，审查制度

sentences.en: I'm opposed to censorship in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 我反对任何形式的审查。

sentences.en: The decree imposed strict censorship of the media.
sentences.cn: 这个法令强制实行严格的媒体审查制度。

sentences.en: The issue has led to a reexamination of censorship rules.
sentences.cn: 这件事导致了对审查制度的重新审视。
